idea: We employ the "Gurukul" system of education in the modern landscape of education. We help students to not just understand concepts but to apply them in such a way that makes it impactful in the real world to solve actual problems. We, therefore, aim to provide customized mentorship for over 16 weeks which will comprise of comprehensive technical skills for data science, soft skills to sell one's ideas and solutions, and several industry-level impactful projects that solve real-life problems. We don't teach, we mentor. Right now we have started mentorship for data science enthusiasts only but we wish to expand our system for other professions as well.
name: Analytica

idea:
Hailing from a century old business from the unorganised textile sector of India, we understand the need to digitize decades old processes. We believe that we are at the critical juncture where new must meet old, to create a synergy that leads to modernisation of the entire industry, gradually. We're in it for the long haul.


We tailor-make our ERP for your business, because we believe that you know your business better than anyone else

Everything we recommend has been tested on and running successfully at industry leading companies

idea:
Brand bame - NaturZest

Harnessing Nature's Goodness


We believe in Nature's power and to give that zest in your hand, we bring Natural Lifestyle products.  The NaturZest brand works with the concept of Natural Products based on pure virgin coconut oil extracted from fresh coconut milk. Our product range includes skin care, face care, lip care, hair care, spa experience oils, family care, and baby care. 

We provide personal gifts, corporate gifts, wedding gifts.


Harnessing Nature’s Goodness

NaturZest believes in Nature’s power and thus brings you products which are enriched with goodness of Nature and are 100% Pure. Using NaturZest natural and Pure products in daily life is one step towards better life, one step Closer to Nature and one step towards accepting Nature’s love.

idea:
Siara Group - is a group of companies we deliver services or provide solution for businesses . we create a very healthy ecosystem for our clients some of our services are ready to use or some services needs customisation as per client needs we know how important  to updated with latest technologies  or business solutions .


Example :- 


Siara Technologies  - ( IT Services ) 


we develop what you do want like web application / mobile application / software development / Artificial Intelligence / home & industries automation systems. other than that we also help you in online marketing via Digital marketing / SEO / SME / SMM etc. our consultants will helps to guide which technology Suites  for your business .


Siara Consultants - ( Business consulting )


We Provide Business Solutions And Helps To Expand Businesses . We Do Franchise Consultant / Business Consulting Services for Businesses Also Guides Which Sales Or Marketing Strategies work For Your Business Model And How To Execute . Features we Have Also An Opportunity For Startups we Have Pre-build panel In Which We Have Some Of India's Well Known Brand Franchise Available On this One Panel That From One Panel You Can start Your Own Business with Multiple Brands Multiple Services or Multiple Sectors At very Low Cost . We Also Provide Sales And marketing support For Startups.


Siara Creation - ( Garments Industry )


Siara Creation Is a Concept Where Manufacturers / Designers / Tailer's Can Collaborate with Each Other From This Platform And Deliver Bestest Quality Of Garments To Their Client . Customer Can Also Order For Customize Dress Or If they Want They Can Buy Ready Made Dresses . This Platform Also Deliver Bulk Orders To Garments Shop Owners And Other Business owners . its A very Unique Concept We Are Going To Use Artificial Intelligence On this Platform.


Siara Hotels - 


Siara Have A Chain Of Hotels Across All Over India . But We Don't Have Fix Pricing Option In This Platform We Are Giving Option To Our Customers They Can Bid For Hotel Where They Want To Stay This Biding Is Held With Hotel Managment staff And Other Addition Features Are Integrated In this Platform .


Siara Travels -


This is a online platform for travellers they can set their Budget Create Your own Packages our Team Will Assist Them whole Journey So that Can Enjoy Without Worries All the Services Provided By Siara Travels .

 

Siara Academy - ( Education )


Behind This Concept We have Very Unique Concept This a Online Education Platform .Where  Parents Can Hire Tutors for Their Child Parents have Multiple options Of Courses And Activities . Offline And Online Both Services We Can Do . This Platform Is Free For NGO's And Some Selected Candidates.


Lots More We Have To Do .
name: Siara Group
